definition: ten (used in fractions, writing checks etc)/assorted/miscellaneous
clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie

sentences.english: Officials in Iraq have increased security in the Shiite city of Karbala.
sentences.chinese: 伊拉克官员已加强了什叶派城市卡尔巴拉的戒备。

sentences.english: But radical Shi'ite cleric Moqtada al-Sadr, is threatening to torpedo the vote.
sentences.chinese: 但是激进的什叶派教士萨德尔威胁要破坏议会的投票。

sentences.english: Shiites are largely barred from the police force, for example, and from the military.
sentences.chinese: 举例来说，什叶派基本不能担任警察或者进入军队。

sentences.english: In Bahrain, the conflict between Sunnis and Shiites is clearly central.
sentences.chinese: 在巴林，逊尼派和什叶派穆斯林的冲突显然是焦点。

sentences.english: Partial counts have Mr. al-Maliki leading in two predominantly Shiite provinces. But Mr.
sentences.chinese: 部分计票显示，马利基在两个什叶派主导的省份领先。

sentences.english: The policemen were from the southern Shi'ite city of Najaf.
sentences.chinese: 遭到伏击的警察来自南部什叶派城市纳杰夫。

sentences.english: There was no regular police there because the police are mostly Shiite.
sentences.chinese: 那里没有固定的警察，因为警察大部分是什叶派教徒。
可贾萨姆是个什叶派穆斯林。

sentences.english: There is also a Twelver Shia minority, mainly of Azeri descent.
sentences.chinese: 还存在着少数什叶派穆斯林，主要是阿塞拜疆系的。

sentences.english: He says the Sunni community feels it is not fairly represented in the Shiite-led government.
sentences.chinese: 他说，逊尼派社区感觉由什叶派领导政府并不公平。

sentences.english: Iran with its Shiia majority had withdrawn its ambassador in protest of the deaths.
sentences.chinese: 为了抗议死亡事件，伊朗及其什叶派召回了大使。

sentences.english: Many Shia pilgrims are making their way to Karbala for the occasion.
sentences.chinese: 许多什叶派教徒赶往卡尔巴拉参加此活动。

sentences.english: The Shiite leader Moqtada Sadr has called for a political solution.
sentences.chinese: 什叶派领导人萨德尔要求政治解决方案。

sentences.english: The Iraqi Shi’ites have their own interests, too.
sentences.chinese: 伊拉克什叶派也是有其自身的利益的。

sentences.english: But many Shia Muslims are wary of it.
sentences.chinese: 但却为许多什叶派的穆斯林所戒慎。

sentences.english: The team would have to include Shia as well as Sunni members.
sentences.chinese: 这个团队既要有什叶派也要有逊尼派的成员。

pinyin: Ku4 er3 de2 Gong1 ren2 dang3

definition: the Copts, major ethnoreligious group of Egyptian Christians
